primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To begin the recovery process for a missing cryptocurrency deposit, please provide the following details:

  • Amount of the deposit
  • Currency
  • TXID/Hash
  • Blockchain network used
  • Ticket ID (a 7-digit number found under “Deposit” in your Transaction History)

If you cannot locate your Ticket ID, please fill out the Missing Deposit Form with your TXID and the exact crypto amount (do not enter its dollar value). You can access the form here: https://kst.mr/S1EHH1uwo

Our Deposit Recovery Form BETA is intended for cryptocurrency deposits that require manual recovery. Please follow these steps:

  1. Login to NDAX.
  2. Click the NDAX symbol in the top-left corner.
  3. Select WALLET from the dropdown menu.
  4. Choose the cryptocurrency you wish to recover.
  5. Click MISSING DEPOSIT at the bottom of the screen.
  6. Enter the AMOUNT and TRANSACTION ID (TXID).
  7. Upload an IMAGE or VIDEO of your transaction record from your external wallet to validate authenticity.
  8. Click SUBMIT.

Note: If you deposited an unsupported asset, our team will review your request and notify you whether recovery is possible (if eligible). Once you submit the form, please inform our support team so we can expedite your request.
